title: Announcement: AFL and Riot Games in world first partnership

hmmmmm yeah definately. no shit.

I mean im sure theyve done research but the impression gamers made on me in high school (as a young high level AFL player) was that they hated sports. i dont see there being much crossover or relation but hey
And our impression was that you hated us...

Just cause a select few dont like sports doesn't mean we all hate sports. 
I've had multiple family members in the AFL and watch just about every game even if its not the team I follow (CARN THE CATTAHS) 
I just love sport in general being AFL, Tennis, Hockey, Esports etc.
im glad to hear there is plenty of people out there that like both, just surprised tbh

I understand this is melbourne and stuff. But every single convention is in melbourne and us sydney folk miss out on it all. Any chance we can have soke excitment

Riot so far had (by memory):
2013 - Pax Australia (Melbourne)
2013 - EBexpo (Sydney)
2014 - Supanova (Perth, Gold Coast)
2014 - Pax Australia
2014 - Armageddon (Auckland)
2014 - EBexpo (Sydney)
2015 - Luna Park (Sydney)
2015 - IWCA (Melbourne)
2016 - OPL Final (Brisbane)
2017 - League Of Origin (Sydney)
2018 - Rift Rival (not sure if has been announced yet)
2018 - League Of Origin (Melbourne)

So to me seems pretty balanced between Sydney and Melbourne.
